content.description: Climb good hands with featured face, and top out on the top floor of the parking garage. If your arms are smallÂ enough, you might be able to reach through and layback!
content.protection: One could sew it up with some hand sizes. This is best done as a solo.
content.location: Across from Best Buy in the free parking lot for Boulder's Century Theater are two different cracks on the N and NW corner. They are just across from the workout area and pool. The NW corner is a bit harder.

content.description: Do you want to go to the movies but can't afford a ticket? Don't worry, the best seat in the house is 100% free! Beware of vines and smooth brick for the first 10 feet. After that, the brick gets rough, and the rest is butter Top out on the roof, and enjoy the film.
content.protection: Chalk only..., and don't get spotted!
content.location: At Century Theater in Boulder between the building and the parking garage, just head to the front entrance of the theater, and take the path along the left side of the building. The pole is on the right.

content.description: Climb up the NW arete on Best Buy, This is as good as double arete slappin' gets on manmade material. The Best Buy logo conveniently offers a ladder downclimb just to the right of the arete! Significantly cleaned up on the FA, may it crumble no more.
content.protection: There's a bush down there, it's kinda sharp. You could maybe set a TR 3/4 up on the Best Buy logo structure...but then why are you even here?

content.description: All I Want is Subway is just another FA put up by the Mallory boys that climbs the first column under the west roof on the south face of Best Buy. You must place both palms on the underside of the giant roof above in order for it to be a send. The first ascent was put up by an overly confident older brother. The second ascent done by an even more confident and extremely hungry younger brother who was rewarded a $5 footlong sub for completing the climb.
content.protection: An appetite for adventure, buildering, and Subway. A pad would just make it weird.
content.location: It is on the South face of Best Buy. Climb the westernmost column under the giant roof (awning).
